translations.We are going to proceed with your cloud: We are going to proceed with your cloud account suppression.
translations.Check the box below if you also want to: Check the box below if you also want to delete the associated shop account(s).
translations.For your information you have %d order(s: For your information you have %d order(s) in your account.
For your information you have %d order(s) in your accounts:
translations.I also want to delete my shop account: I also want to delete my shop account
translations.If you want to keep your shop account pl: If you want to keep your shop account please validate or modify the email address below. This email address will become your new login to the shop.
translations.Error while setting shop delete preferen: Error while setting shop delete preference
translations.Shop email cannot be same as this accoun: Murena.com email cannot be same as this account's email.
translations.A Murena.com account already uses this e: A Murena.com account already uses this e-mail address.
You are part of the beta users.
translations.Note : as the features are not released: Note : as the features are not released yet, you may encounter some bugs. Please report them or give your feedback using the form below.
translations.Want to take a break from beta features?: Want to take a break from beta features? Just click on the button below. You can become a beta user again anytime!
translations.Do you want to become a beta user?: Do you want to become a beta user?
translations.You want to experiment new features ahea: You want to experiment new features ahead of the others and provide feedback on them before and if they're released? This section is made for you!
translations.To get a preview of our new features you: To get a preview of our new features you need to become part of our beta users. To do so, simply click on the button below. You can opt out of beta features at anytime.
translations.Are you sure you want to opt out of beta: Are you sure you want to opt out of beta features?
translations.You no longer have access to experimenta: You no longer have access to experimental features.
translations.Congratulations! You've successfully bee: Congratulations! You've successfully been added to the beta users.
translations.Beta program is not available at the mom: Beta program is not available at the moment.
translations.Title: Title
translations.Please give us as many details as possib: Please give us as many details as possible
translations.Here is the list of currently available: Here is the list of currently available beta features:
translations.A subscription is active in this account: A subscription is active in this account. Please cancel it or let it expire before deleting your account.
translations.Temporary error contacting murena.com; p: Temporary error contacting murena.com; please try again later!
translations.For security reasons you need to set a r: For security reasons you need to set a recovery address for your Murena Cloud account.
translations.As long as you don't, you'll have limite: As long as you don't, you'll have limited access to your account.
translations.I want to receive news about Murena prod: I want to receive news about Murena products and promotions.
I want to receive news about /e/OS.
translations.Your name as shown to others: Your name as shown to others
translations.Username must consist of letters, number: Username must consist of letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores only.
translations.Username must be at least 3 characters l: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
translations.The confirm password does not match the: The confirm password does not match the password.
Human Verification code is not correct.
translations.You must read and accept the Terms of Se: You must read and accept the Terms of Service to create your account.
translations.I have read and accept the <a href='http: I have read and accept the Terms of Service.
translations.If you want to use your murena.io email: If you want to use your murena.io email in a mail app like Thunderbird, Outlook or another, please visit this page.
translations.Incorrect password length: Required leng: Incorrect password length: Required length is 8 to 32
translations.For security reasons, a recovery email i: For security reasons, a recovery email is required. If you decide to set it later, your account will be partially restricted.
translations.Recovery email address has an incorrect: Recovery email address has an incorrect format.
Recovery email address is already taken.
translations.You cannot set an email address with a M: You cannot set an email address with a Murena domain as recovery email address.
translations.A server-side error occurred while proce: A server-side error occurred while processing your request! Please try again later.
translations.An error occurred while creating your ac: An error occurred while creating your account!
